DOC.brief_title: The TLC2 ( Teaching Healthy Lifestyles Caregivers 2 ) /CALM ( Counseling Advice Lifestyle Management ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study combine element two previous study -- Teaching Healthy Lifestyles Caregivers ( TLC2 ) Counseling Advice Lifestyle Management ( CALM ) -- compare exercise diet intervention caregiver non-caregivers . Two hundred forty healthy men woman age 50 old , half caregiver half non-caregivers , randomly assign one four condition : - 12-month physical activity intervention 12-month dietary counseling intervention deliver simultaneously ; - 12-month counseling intervention first focus physical activity follow addition dietary counseling ; - 12-month counseling intervention first focus dietary counseling follow addition physical activity counseling ; - 12-month attention-control condition focus stress-management skill train . Data physical activity participation , saturate fat consumption , relate quality life indicator ( e.g. , improved physical functioning , fitness , sleep , psychological well-being ) collect baseline , 4 month , 8 month , 12 month post-test . The primary hypothesis : - participant assigned physical activity dietary counseling condition show great improvement physical activity participation saturate fat consumption 12 month compare attention-control condition ; - participant sequentially-delivered counseling intervention show great improvement physical activity saturate fat consumption compare participant simultaneously-delivered intervention .
